--------------------------------------------------
Dear Nada,

 

I hope this email finds you well and that 2025 has started off positively for you.

 

My role remains the same. Please note that we have cover for United States companies where Chalhoub Group Limited has majority ownership.

 

However, I will need some documents as we there is a declaration requirement when adding US/Canada entities, namely:

 

*	Business Licenses
*	Tax Registration Document
*	Articles of Incorporation
*	Corporate Structure Chart leading to Chalhoub Group Limited

 

The inclusion will very likely be at no additional cost. However, if there is any additional premium requirement by the insurer, I will be sure to advise accordingly.

 

Remain at your disposal for any further assistance required.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

 

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

There is no need to purchase D&O insurance from the US as we have it covered under a group policy applicable for companies with majority ownership by Chalhoub Group Limited (Chalhoub Partent Company).

 

I just need the below documents as there is a declaration requirement when adding US/Canada entities, namely:

 

*	Business Licenses
*	Tax Registration Document
*	Articles of Incorporation
*	Corporate Structure Chart leading to Chalhoub Group Limited (with ownership percentages included)

 

There will not be any additional cost charged to you for this year. For the policy renewal, we generally split the cost proportionally based on the TO of the entity in comparison to the TO of the group.

 

Just if you can provide me with the necessary documents so that I can declare to the insurer. Once the entity is included, I will share with you a certificate from the insurer, validating that the cover is in force.

 

Let me know if you need any further assistance.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Eugenia,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

There is no need to purchase D&O insurance from the US as we have it covered under a group policy applicable for companies with majority ownership by Chalhoub Group Limited (Chalhoub Partent Company).

 

I just need the below documents as there is a declaration requirement when adding US/Canada entities, namely:

 

*	Business Licenses
*	Tax Registration Document
*	Articles of Incorporation
*	Corporate Structure Chart leading to Chalhoub Group Limited (with ownership percentages included)

 

There will not be any additional cost charged to you for this year. For the policy renewal, we generally split the cost proportionally based on the TO of the entity in comparison to the TO of the group.
